TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServiceProcessInstaller extends System.Configuration.Install.ComponentInstaller

summary.span: 安装一个可执行文件，该文件包含扩展 的类。

span.span: Installs an executable containing classes that extend .

summary.span: 该类由安装实用工具（如 InstallUtil.exe）在安装服务应用程序时调用。

span.span: This class is called by installation utilities, such as InstallUtil.exe, when installing a service application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的工作原理普遍适用于所有服务可执行文件。The does work common to all services in an executable. 安装实用程序使用它编写与你想要安装的服务相关联的注册表值。It is used by the installation utility to write registry values associated with services you want to install. 若要安装的服务，创建的项目安装程序类继承自，并设置到类上`true`。To install a service, create a project installer class that inherits from , and set the on the class to `true`. 在项目中，实例化一个每个服务应用程序，另一个实例应用程序中每个服务实例。Within your project, instantiate one instance per service application, and one instance for each service in the application. 最后，添加实例和到您的项目安装程序类的实例。Finally, add the instance and the instances to your project installer class. 该实用工具 InstallUtil.exe 运行时，查找与服务程序集中的类设置为`true`。When InstallUtil.exe runs, the utility looks for classes in the service assembly with the set to `true`. 通过将它们添加到类添加到服务程序集项目安装程序与关联的集合。Add classes to the service assembly by adding them to the collection associated with your project installer. 如果是`false`，安装实用工具会忽略项目安装程序。If is `false`, the install utility ignores the project installer. 实例的，可以修改的属性包括指定登录的用户以外的其他帐户下运行服务应用程序。For an instance of , properties you can modify include specifying that a service application run under an account other than the logged-on user. 可以指定特定并对其下为服务应运行，也可以使用来指定计算机的系统帐户、 本地或网络服务帐户或用户帐户下运行该服务。You can specify a particular and pair under which the service should run, or you can use to specify that the service run under the computer's System account, a local or network service account, or a user account. > [!NOTE] > 计算机的系统帐户不是管理员帐户相同。The computer's System account is not the same as the Administrator account. 通常情况下，不调用方法上在代码中; 它们通常称为仅由安装实用工具。Normally, you do not call the methods on within your code; they are generally called only by the install utility. 安装实用工具会自动调用和在安装过程中的方法。The install utility automatically calls the and methods during the installation process. 如有必要，它退出故障，通过调用(或) 上所有以前安装的组件。It backs out failures, if necessary, by calling (or ) on all previously installed components. 应用程序的安装例程会维护有关已安装，使用项目安装程序的组件自动信息。An application's install routine maintains information automatically about the components already installed, using the project installer's . 此状态信息将持续更新作为实例和每个实用工具安装实例。This state information is continuously updated as the instance and each instance is installed by the utility. 它是通常不需要为你的代码可以显式修改此状态信息。It is usually unnecessary for your code to modify this state information explicitly. 实例化基类构造函数中，将导致调用。Instantiating a causes the base class constructor, , to be called. ## Examples 下面的示例创建名为 MyProjectInstaller，继承的项目安装程序。The following example creates a project installer called MyProjectInstaller, which inherits from . 假定没有服务可执行文件，其中包含两个服务，"Hello World 服务 1"和"Hello World 服务 2"。It is assumed there is a service executable that contains two services, "Hello-World Service 1" and "Hello-World Service 2". MyProjectInstaller （这将由安装实用工具调用），为构造函数内对于每个服务，创建对象和一个创建可执行文件。Within the constructor for MyProjectInstaller (which would be called by the install utility), objects are created for each service, and a is created for the executable. 安装实用程序识别为有效的安装程序，MyProjectInstaller属性设置为`true`。For the install utility to recognize MyProjectInstaller as a valid installer, the attribute is set to `true`. 可选属性在进程安装程序和服务安装程序设置，安装程序添加到之前集合。Optional properties are set on the process installer and the service installers before the installers are added to the collection. 当安装实用工具访问 MyProjectInstaller 时，将对象添加到集合通过调用将反过来安装。When the install utility accesses MyProjectInstaller, the objects added to the collection through a call to will be installed in turn. 在过程中，安装程序维护，指示已安装哪些对象，以便每个对象可以依次在发生安装失败时的状态信息。During the process, the installer maintains state information indicating which objects have been installed, so each object can be backed out in turn in case of an installation failure. 通常情况下，您将不显式实例化您的项目安装程序类。Normally, you would not instantiate your project installer class explicitly. 您可以创建它，并添加，但安装实用程序实际调用，并因此实例化类。You would create it and add the , but the install utility actually calls, and therefore instantiates, the class. [!code-cpp[Classic ServiceInstaller Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ServiceInstaller Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ServiceInstaller Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ServiceInstaller Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ServiceInstaller Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ServiceInstaller Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceProcess::ServiceAccount Account { System::ServiceProcess::ServiceAccount get(); void set(System::ServiceProcess::ServiceAccount value); };
member this.Account : System.ServiceProcess.ServiceAccount with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置运行该服务应用程序时所使用的帐户类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of account under which to run this service application.

value.span: ，它定义系统运行此服务时所使用的帐户类型。

span.span: A that defines the type of account under which the system runs this service.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性是`User`，则和属性用于定义服务应用程序运行的帐户。When the property is `User`, the and properties are used to define an account under which the service application runs. 和对允许以不同的系统帐户的帐户下运行的服务。The and pair allows the service to run under an account other than the system account. 这可以例如，允许无用户登录时自动启动重新启动，在该服务。This can, for example, allow the service to start automatically at reboot, when no user is logged on. 如果将任一或为空，并且已设置到`User`，系统将提示您输入有效的用户名和密码在安装时。If you leave either the or empty and set to `User`, you will be prompted for a valid user name and password at installation. 您还可以指定的本地系统帐户或本地运行的服务或网络服务。You can also specify that the service run under the local system account, or as a local or network service. 请参阅枚举类型的帐户的详细信息。See the enumeration for details on types of accounts.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void CopyFromComponent(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent comp) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub CopyFromComponent (comp As IComponent)

span.span: The that represents the service process.

summary.span: 在没有 类特定行为的情况下实现基类 方法。

span.span: Implements the base class method with no class-specific behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不应在代码中调用此方法。This method should not be called within your code. 上的基类方法是`abstract`，因此此处派生类中实现它。The base class method on is `abstract`, so it is implemented here on the derived class. 但是，没有任何类特定于方法的实现中的处理。However, there is no class-specific processing in the method's implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property HelpText As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ HelpText { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取为服务安装选项显示的帮助文本。

span.span: Gets help text displayed for service installation options.

value.span: 帮助文本，提供为在特定帐户下运行服务而设置用户名和密码的步骤说明。

span.span: Help text that provides a description of the steps for setting the user name and password in order to run the service under a particular account.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 手动启动服务时，可以使用此帮助文本。This help text can be used when a service starts manually. 它指示用户如何输入用户名和密码信息。It indicates to the user how to enter user name and password information.

Public Overrides Sub Install (stateSaver As IDictionary)

param.name: stateSaver
param.span: ，包含与安装关联的上下文信息。

span.span: An that contains the context information associated with the installation.

summary.span: 将服务应用程序信息写入注册表。

span.span: Writes service application information to the registry.

summary.span: 该方法旨在由自动调用适当方法的安装工具使用。

span.span: This method is meant to be used by installation tools, which call the appropriate methods automatically.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，不调用方法上在代码中; 它们通常称为仅由安装实用工具。Normally, you do not call the methods on within your code; they are generally called only by the install utility. 安装实用工具会自动调用在安装过程中的方法。The install utility automatically calls the method during the installation process. 如有必要，它退出故障，通过调用上以前安装的所有组件。It backs out failures, if necessary, by calling on all previously installed components. 此方法将安装传递给基类方法。This method passes the installation to the base class method. 通常情况下，您将不会调用方法上在代码中; 它们通常称为仅由安装实用工具。Normally, you will not call the methods on within your code; they are generally called only by the install utility. 安装实用工具会自动调用和在安装过程中的方法。The install utility automatically calls the and methods during the installation process. 如有必要，它退出故障，通过调用(或) 上所有以前安装的组件It backs out failures, if necessary, by calling (or ) on all previously installed components 应用程序的安装例程会维护有关已安装，使用项目安装程序的组件自动信息。An application's install routine maintains information automatically about the components already installed, using the project installer's . 此状态信息传递到作为`stateSaver`参数，将持续更新作为实例和每个实用工具安装实例。This state information, passed into as the `stateSaver` parameter, is continuously updated as the instance and each instance is installed by the utility. 它是通常不需要为你的代码可以显式修改此状态信息。It is usually unnecessary for your code to modify this state information explicitly. 将基类方法引发的任何异常传递给调用方法或 / 事件处理程序。 passes to the calling method any exceptions thrown by base class methods or / event handlers.

span.span: The is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Password { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Password : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置与运行服务应用程序时所使用用户帐户关联的密码。

span.span: Gets or sets the password associated with the user account under which the service application runs.

value.span: 与运行服务时所使用帐户关联的密码。

span.span: The password associated with the account under which the service should run.
The default is an empty string ("").

value.span: 该属性非公共属性，并且从不序列化。

span.span: The property is not public, and is never serialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和对允许以不同的系统帐户的帐户下运行的服务。The and pair allows the service to run under an account other than the system account. 这可以例如，允许无用户登录时自动启动重新启动，在该服务。This can, for example, allow the service to start automatically at reboot, when no user is logged on. 并进行处理以安全的方式，因为它们永远不会序列化或保存到的安装状态 (项目安装程序的) 或其他位置的公共访问权限。 and are handled in a secure manner in that they are never serialized or saved to the install state (the project installer's ) or other location with public access. 设置和允许要在安装时自动与服务相关联的帐户。Setting the and allows an account to be associated automatically with the service at install time. 如果将任一或为空，并且已设置到`User`，系统将提示您输入有效的用户名和密码在安装时。If you leave either the or empty and set to `User`, you will be prompted for a valid user name and password at installation. 运行在单独的帐户服务的另一种方法是使用计算机的系统帐户。Another option for running a service under a separate account is to use the computer's System account. 该帐户，这是截然不同的管理员帐户，不需要密码。That account, which is distinct from the Administrator account, requires no password. 系统帐户的权限可能会超过当前已登录用户。The System account's privileges may exceed those of the user currently logged in. 系统帐户下运行，而不是用户帐户可以避免出现问题导致用户缺少权限的服务要求Running under the System account rather than a user account avoids problems resulting from the user lacking a permission the service requires 如果而不是任何值`User`，使用指定帐户 （本地或网络服务或本地系统），则即使和属性进行填充。If is any value other than `User`, the specifed account (local or network service, or local system) is used, even if the and properties are populated.

summary.span: 该方法旨在由自动处理适当方法的安装工具使用。

span.span: This method is meant to be used by installation tools, which process the appropriate methods automatically.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，不调用方法上在代码中; 它们通常称为仅由安装实用工具。Normally, you do not call the methods on within your code; they are generally called only by the install utility. 安装实用工具会自动调用在安装过程中的方法。The install utility automatically calls the method during the installation process. 如有必要，它退出故障，通过调用上生成了异常的对象。It backs out failures, if necessary, by calling on the object that generated the exception. 应用程序的安装例程会维护有关已安装，使用项目安装程序的组件自动信息。An application's install routine maintains information automatically about the components already installed, using the project installer's . 此状态信息传递到作为`savedState`参数，将持续更新作为实例和每个实用工具安装实例。This state information, passed into as the `savedState` parameter, is continuously updated as the instance and each instance is installed by the utility. 它是通常不需要为你的代码可以显式修改此状态信息。It is usually unnecessary for your code to modify this state information explicitly. 将基类方法引发的任何异常传递给调用方法或 / 事件处理程序。 passes to the calling method any exceptions thrown by base class methods or / event handlers.

member this.Username : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置运行服务应用程序时将使用的用户帐户。

span.span: Gets or sets the user account under which the service application will run.

value.span: 运行服务时将使用的帐户。

span.span: The account under which the service should run.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和对允许以不同的系统帐户的帐户下运行的服务。The and pair allows the service to run under an account other than the system account. 这可以例如，允许无用户登录时自动启动重新启动，在该服务。This can, for example, allow the service to start automatically at reboot, when no user is logged on. 并进行处理以安全的方式，因为它们永远不会序列化或保存到的安装状态 (项目安装程序的) 或其他位置的公共访问权限。 and are handled in a secure manner in that they are never serialized or saved to the install state (the project installer's ) or other location with public access. 设置和允许要在安装时自动与服务相关联的帐户。Setting the and allows an account to be associated automatically with the service at install time. 如果将任一或为空，并且已设置到`User`，系统将提示您输入有效的用户名和密码在安装时。If you leave either the or empty and set to `User`, you will be prompted for a valid user name and password at installation. 运行在单独的帐户服务的另一种方法是使用计算机的系统帐户。Another option for running a service under a separate account is to use the computer's System account. 该帐户，这是截然不同的管理员帐户，不需要密码。That account, which is distinct from the Administrator account, requires no password. 系统帐户的权限可能会超过当前已登录用户。The System account's privileges may exceed those of the user currently logged in. 系统帐户下运行，而不是用户帐户可以避免出现问题导致用户缺少权限的服务要求Running under the System account rather than a user account avoids problems resulting from the user lacking a permission the service requires 如果而不是任何值`User`，使用指定的帐户 （本地或网络服务或本地系统），即使和属性进行填充。If is any value other than `User`, the specified account (local or network service, or local system) is used, even if the and properties are populated.
